paper_abstract: For Tikhonov regularization in supervised learning from data, the effect on the regularized solution of a joint perturbation of the regression function and the data is investigated. Spectral windows in the finite-sample and population cases are compared via probabilistic estimates of the differences between regularized solutions. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On spectral windows in supervised learning from data
